title: masterbacon
author: masterbacon
created_time: August 12, 2022, 08:51:52 AMLast edit: September 27, 2022, 03:02:00 AM by masterbacon
content: ╔═ WELCOME STONER ═╗GoldenArk is a California State licensed grower of Cannabis that supplies licensed dispensaries and the general public with marijuana products grown from the original seeds Ark has collected from around the world. Wishing to make a positive contribution to the development of Web 3.0. technology we stand as an early developer and creator of platforms and products for the metaverse that will be used by millions of individuals in social groups with like interests; defining and shaping the metaverse that is forecasted to be a trillion-dollar industry in just a few short years.╔═ Follow Us ═╗Website | Telegram | Discord !!There will be a total of 42000 $ARK420 allocated as bounty program rewards.!!Submit the form to join our bounty program!!●General RulesThe bounty program will run until the 22nd of October 2022.A. All participants must join GoldenArkAsia Telegram Group and make at least 1 constructive comment.B. Participants must submit the Bounty  Form in order to claim the rewards.C. Talking about the bounty program in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the program and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the Bounty group.D. Using multiple accounts, cheating, and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all of your accounts will be banned permanently.E. If I remove you from the program for any reason, I reserve the right to delete your stakes.F. KYC is not required for the bounty program. However, the project team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.G. The bounty manager and the project team reserve the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.H. Your forum account must be 2 months old to join this bounty program.I. Submit weekly report in bounty thread, until Saturday 23:59 by forum default time. The report should be submitted during the current week. You can't edit the report after the current weekend. Reports with quotes are not accepted╔═ To Participate ═╗Step 1. Join  GoldenArkAsia Telegram at least 1 constructive comment.Step 2. Complete other campaigns that you desire in the program.Step 3. Submit bounty form.Step 4. Report in bounty thread▌Report example ▌Time:Week 1:2022/0815–0821Week 2:2022/0822–0828…Participate in the event: Twitter Campaign/Telegram Campaign /…Telegram Username:Posts:1.2.3.Twitter Profile Link:Retweet:1.2.3.Tweeted links:1.2.3.…╔═ Telegram Ambassador Campaign ═╗Rewards:10 $ARK420 per weekRules:Code:1. Replace your profile picture with GoldenArkAsia Logo.2. Write at least 5 constructive messages in other crypto-related telegram groups to talk about GoldenArkAsia and add a link to the GoldenArkAsia telegram group. Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and not be considered spam.3. Deleted messages will not be counted.4. If you remove your name and profile pic before the campaign ends your stakes will be deleted.╔═ Telegram Campaign ═╗Rewards:10 $ARK420 per weekRules:Code:1. You must join GoldenArkAsia Telegram Group and stay till the campaign ends.2. If you ask any bounty-related question on the main chat you will be banned from the campaign.3. Join the Bounty group to ask bounty-related questions.4. Don't do spamming ask only constructive questions and help others.5. Write at least 5 constructive messages to reply to other people's questions.╔═ Article & Blog Campaign ═╗Rewards:High Quality: 50 $ARK420Medium Quality: 30 $ARK420Low Quality 10 $ARK420Write about GoldenArkAsia.Rules:Code:1. The accepted blogs and sites are Medium, blogger, WordPress, personal websites, third-party websites, and any website that is strictly related to cryptocurrencies or blockchain.2. The posts and articles published must contain a minimum of 500 words, the GoldenArkAsia logo, and a link to the telegram group.3. Plagiarism or use of spam or copied publications, unfavorable for GoldenArkAsia, will be considered invalid submissions.4. Only 1 article per person. 5. The e-mail you used for registering in our Bounty must be visible on the website of your blog so we can verify you are the author of the article in order to pay you your bounty.6. Maximum 20 articles per week.╔═ Twitter & Facebook & Instagram Campaign ═╗Rewards:500+ followers: 1 $ARK420/week1500+ followers: 3 $ARK420/week5000+ followers: 5 $ARK420/week10,000+ followers: 10 $ARK420/weekWrite about GoldenArkAsia and link to Telegram in your postJoin the Discord to obtain informationRules:Code:1. Account must be at least 3 months old with over 200 followers.2. Create at least 2 unique tweets about the GoldenArk project per week, using these hashtags #GoldeArkAsia  #$ARK4203. Maximum 5 tweets and retweets per week4. Submit weekly report in bounty thread, until Saturday 23:59 by forum default time. Reports should be submitted during the current week. You can't edit the report after the current weekend. Reports with quotes are not accepted.╔═ Youtube Videos Campaign ═╗Rewards:High Quality: 40 $ARK420Medium Quality: 20 $ARK420Low Quality 10 $ARK420Rules:Code:1. Describe GoldenArk and its features2. Your video must be 3 mins long and must be uploaded to Youtube.3. Your video must have 300 views minimum. Or it will be disqualified.4. Video must be original and made only by you. Only one video per person is allowed.5. Video description must have the website link, and telegram group link.6. You must put your proof of authentication at the bottom of the video description.7. Videos that do not have a human voice-over will only receive 50% of the total bounty.8. The e-mail you used for registering in our bounty sign-up form must be visible on your YouTube channel so we can verify you are the author of the video in order to pay you your bounty. ╔═Invite Campaign ═╗ Rewards:Invite 5 people: 1 $ARK420/weekInvite 10 people: 5 $ARK420/weekInvite 20 people: 10 $ARK420/weekInvite 30 people: 15 $ARK420/weekInvite 50 people:  20$ARK420/weekInvite Your Friends to Join our Telegram or DiscordRules:Code:1. Invitees to the GoldenArkAsia telegram/Discord must remain in the group.2. Invitees must be in real person and active.╔═ Translation ═╗ Rewards:5 $ARK420 per ArticalTranslate the Document for GoldenArk, please see the following for accepted languages.Rules:Code:1. The translation must be of high quality, and automated tools like Google translate must not be used.2. The translator should be responsible and moderate the translation thread.3. Enter your translation results no later than 6 days after your proposal has been accepted.4. Accepted languages are any Asian languages.!!Reward Request Form!!●QuestionsReach out if any questionsPlease feel free to contact us with any questions. The feedback of our community is invaluable in helping us build a better GoldenArkAsia for the future - keep it coming! We are happy to assist you. We look forward to this small step on GoldenArk's path to underpin the trustless token ecosystem of the future!-  GoldenArkAsia Telegram - https://t.me/goldenark_asia_chat●IMPORTANTTo receive and earn $ARK420 tokens, participants will perform as many bounty tasks as they want by following the requirements below and submitting a Bounty Reward Report for the task that was performed.Each bounty task will be validated before the tokens are distributed. Only tasks that follow the bounty program terms will be eligible to receive the rewards.The GoldenArkAsia Bounty Program will be held on weekly periods. Once the weekly period is over, we will finish reviewing your bounty claims, your content quality, and social media engagement, and we will add tokens to your account balance accordingly. Please note that the content you claim the bounty must be published and accessible at all times.Bots, automated posting, spamming, trolling, and insulting are not allowed and will be considered as breaking the GoldenArkAsia Bounty Program Terms. Such behavior will automatically expel you from the Bounty program and you will lose your right to earn $ARK420 without notice.
